data.title: About Us
data.text:
Maxis Investments Ltd was established in 2005 by İş Investment with an aim to expand the range of products to a higher degree of sophistication to meet investors’ varying needs while at the same time to offer local and global markets expertise to a broader investor range.

As the first brokerage house in the UK owned by a Turkish Entity, Maxis Investments is the pioneer amongst its peers.

Maxis Investments offers institutional, corporate and retail investors comprehensive advice and execution solutions with a broad range of products.

Maxis Investments benefits from its parents’ strong expertise, know-how and market position in Turkey and abroad.

Maxis Investments is Authorised and Regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority.

Maxis Investments Ltd is wholly owned by Is Yatirim Menkul Degerler A.S. (İş Investment) which is one of the largest securities and investment firms in Turkey and a subsidiary of Turkiye Is Bankasi A.S (İşbank).

İş Investment's majority shareowner İşbank which has been one of the largest and most reputable banks in Turkey since its foundation by Ataturk in 1924 established İş Investment as its investment banking and brokerage arm in 1996.

İş Investment holds a leading position in Turkish equities and derivatives markets as well as IPO issuance, privatisations and M&A transactions. İş Investment has been mandated as a co-manager in many international Eurobond deals.
